welcome_message_body: Welcome to Ansan, Korea, South! Get ready to explore our charming city, known for its rich history, beautiful parks, and delicious street food. We hope you enjoy your time here and make unforgettable memories.

restaurants.name: McDonald's (맥도날드)
restaurants.description: McDonald's (맥도날드) is a fast food restaurant located in 안산시.

restaurants.description: 삿뽀로 is a japanese restaurant located in 안산시.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Gimpo Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A newer terminal at Gimpo Airport, primarily serving domestic flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal for domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal for domestic flights only.

wifi.note: Passengers can connect to the WiFi network for free by selecting 'SeoulABWiFi' and following the instructions.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Osan AB Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Osan AB Airport, primarily used for military and cargo flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal of Seoul (Incheon) Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A newer terminal at Seoul (Incheon) Airport, primarily used for international flights.

wifi.note: Passengers can access free WiFi throughout the airport by connecting to the network and completing a short registration process.
